item.description: Please feel free to send me an email or a direct message with your comments and questions, or just to say hi. üì© Send an Email Email me at TheCOGCatholic (an Outlook.com address). üîë Here is my GPG key if you wish to encrypt your email. üîê To encrypt emails using… Thunderbird: See video “Encrypt your Personal Email with Thunderbird.” Webmail Use Mailvelope with its browser extension. Android Use K-9 Mail from Google Play or F-Droid.
